arg.name: limited
arg.doc: If true, limits joint range [-PI, PI] on all joints.

param.name: robot_description
param.command: $(find xacro)/xacro '$(find ur_with_cam_gazebo)/urdf/ur_with_cam.xacro' arm:=$(arg arm) base:=$(arg base) camera:=$(arg camera) camera2:=$(arg camera2) limited:=$(arg limited)
